15#ifndef OPENSSL_HEADER_CHACHA_H
16#define OPENSSL_HEADER_CHACHA_H
17
18#include <openssl/base.h>
19
20#ifdef __cplusplus
21extern "C" {
22#endif
23
24
25/* CRYPTO_chacha_20 encrypts |in_len| bytes from |in| with the given key and
26 * nonce and writes the result to |out|, which may be equal to |in|. The
27 * initial block counter is specified by |counter|. */
28OPENSSL_EXPORT void CRYPTO_chacha_20(uint8_t *out, const uint8_t *in,
29 size_t in_len, const uint8_t key[32],
30 const uint8_t nonce[12], uint32_t counter);
31
32
33#if defined(__cplusplus)
34} /* extern C */
35#endif
36
37#endif /* OPENSSL_HEADER_CHACHA_H */
38
